item.title: GRE : A Guide for a 328ish Score
item.description: Note This post is written in the form of an interview. Reasons* below When was your GRE and when did you start preparing for it? My GRE was on 5th of July. I started preparing for it around 20th of May. What was your score? I scored 160⁄170 in Verbal Section, 168⁄170 in Quantitative Section and 4⁄6 in Analytical Writing Skills. You had 2 weeks for preparation. Do you think it was enough for you?
